name: BREAK REPAIR
desc: The term break/fix or break'n fix refers to the fee-for-service method of providing information technology (IT) services to businesses.

name: IGNITION TEST
desc: Ignition test means heating a material at specified temperature, this test will help in identifying the compound by observing how the sample burns.

name: OIL & FILTERS
desc: An oil filter is a filter designed to remove contaminants from engine oil, transmission oil, lubricating oil, or hydraulic oil.

name: ENGINE DIAGNOSTICS
desc: Engine Diagnostics refers to any type of manual or computerized assessment used to identify problems your car may be experiencing.

name: EXHAUST REPAIR
desc: The exhaust system is one of the hardest worked systems of your vehicle.

name: A/C RECHARGE
desc: When your car's air conditioning (AC) begins to lose power and doesn't blow cool air, it may be time for an AC recharge.
